dct_title_s: Description generale de toute la France
dct_description_sm: Bar scale on map given in "Milliaria Gallica communia".
Title at top, decorative cartouche with descriptive text, coat of arms, crown with fleur de lis.
"Ceste description se doit mettre aps le fueil. 160."
Map based on Ortelius' first modern map of the German Empire, 1570, and includes the same decorative cartouche, ship at sea, and coat of arms.
Appears in Belleforet's Cosmographie universelle de tout le monde, 1575, French edition of Münster's Cosmographia universalis, 1544-1628.
